code: import isUnitlessNumber from'../unitlessNumbers';function dangerousStyleValue(name,value,isCustomProperty){var isEmpty=value==null||typeof value==='boolean'||value==='';if(isEmpty){return'';}if(!isCustomProperty&&typeof value==='number'&&value!==0&&!(isUnitlessNumber.hasOwnProperty(name)&&isUnitlessNumber[name])){return value+'px';}return(''+value).trim();}export default dangerousStyleValue;
